tasks.title: Add Configuration menu item to open settings without clearing them
tasks.description: Add a 'Configuration' option to the File menu that navigates back to config.html so the user can view and adjust settings without clearing existing settings.

tasks.title: Fix Windows SHA-512 checksum mismatch in CI auto-update builds
tasks.description: Fixed: recompute-checksums.js URL regex didn't match YAML list item syntax ('  - url:' has a dash that \s+ doesn't match). Updated regex to handle '- ' prefix. Also added logging, error handling, and validation.

tasks.title: Investigate/fix update dialog showing File/Edit menus on Windows
tasks.description: Fixed: added autoHideMenuBar:true and removeMenu() to both checking and downloading dialog BrowserWindows in updates-main.ts.

tasks.title: Refactor codebase into highly testable TypeScript
tasks.description: Convert the existing JavaScript codebase to TypeScript with a focus on testability.

tasks.title: Improve design of diagnostic information on the configuration screen
tasks.description: Redesign the diagnostics section in config.html to be more polished and visually appealing. Currently it's a basic table with minimal styling inside a semi-transparent box. Consider improving layout, typography, spacing, status indicators, and overall visual hierarchy to better match a modern Electron app settings page. The diagnostics show platform, Electron/Chrome versions, hardware acceleration status, H.264/H.265 codec support, and app version.
